name: pnp-monitor-and-notify-microsoft-365-health-status
title: Monitor and notify Microsoft 365 health status
shortDescription: This is a script which monitors the health status of your Microsoft 365 tenant and notifies if something is not normal.
longDescription: This is a script which monitors the health status of your Microsoft 365 tenant and notifies if something is not normal. Script creates a SharePoint List and will add the outage content to that. It will also send an email notification to the configured user.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
